Nerangs.ab: āiiese yešti raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca tā ō ī yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raθβō aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca āiiese yešti xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm agar xšnūman ahlawān bēd aṣ̌āunąm frauuaṣ̌inąm tā nabānazdištanąm frauuaṣ̌inąm auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō tā gyāg abāyēd guftan. agar gāhānbār bēd ka aṣ̌aōninąmca aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm guft pas āiiese yešti raϑβō bərəzatō tā yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō aēsmąn āiiese yešti ... xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō agar gāh ī dīgar bēd aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe āiiese yešti az aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi tā aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe dō bār guftan aṣ̌āunąm frauuaṣ̌inąm tā nabānazdištanąm frauuaṣ̌inąm.

"(Zōt and rāspīg should recite): āiiese yešti raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca until yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raθβō aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca āiiese yešti xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm. If it is the šnūman for the ahlawān, (then they should recite): aṣ̌āunąm frauuaṣ̌inąm OD nabānazdištanąm frauuaṣ̌inąm, then they must recite auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō until the end." "If it is a gāhānbār ceremony, when they have said aṣ̌aōninąmca aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm, then āiiese yešti raϑβō bərəzatō until yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō aēsmąn āiiese yešti ... xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō If it another gāh, (then they say it and continue with) aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe āiiese yešti They should recite from aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi until aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe (and continue with) aṣ̌āunąm frauuaṣ̌inąm until nabānazdištanąm frauuaṣ̌inąm."

yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raθβō aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca āiiese yešti xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm xšnūman ān ī bēd dō bār guftan ka yazišn ī gāhānbār bēd ka-t yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō guft maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raθβō ayāb gāh kē bēd guftan aēsmąn āiiese yešti ... xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōišəmahe raϑβō. ayāb ān gāh bēd aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe az aēsmąn ā y tā yazatahe dō bār ā y agar ahlawān pad yazišn bēd auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō tā vaɱąsca.

"yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raθβō aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca āiiese yešti xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm. They should recite the corresponding šnūman twice. If it is a liturgy from Gāhānbār, when you have recited yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō, they have to recite maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raθβō or the corresponding gāh. (They continuue with) aēsmąn āiiese yešti ... xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōišəmahe raϑβō. or the corresponding gāh (and then) aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe. They should recite from aēsmąn ā y until yazatahe twice. If there are the ahlawān in the liturgy, (they recite): auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō until vaɱąsca."
